abstract: Cisco Systems agreed to buy IronPort Systems for $830 million to push into the security software market.
snippet: Cisco Systems agreed to buy IronPort Systems for $830 million to push into the security software market.
lead_paragraph: Cisco Systems, the world’s largest maker of computer networking equipment, has agreed to buy IronPort Systems for $830 million to push into the security software market.

headline.main: Cisco to Buy Maker of Security Software
headline.print_headline: Cisco to Buy Maker Of Security Software
